DOC.brief_summary: The aim of this study is to evaluate the bioavailability of "Novo C Plus" vitamin C containing dietary supplement compared to licensed vitamin C medications. The novelty of this product is the liposomal formulation.
DOC.brief_title: "Novo C Plus" Vitamin C Containing Dietary Supplement Bioavailability in Healthy Subjects
